alldb.table_sql: select info.id id, info.cust_number custnumber, info.cust_name custname, info.cust_class custclass, person.creator_ creator, person.create_date createdate, person.modificator_ modificator, person.modify_date modifydate, person.id personid, person.id_card_no idcardno, CASE WHEN person.sex_ = '0' THEN 'ç”·' WHEN person.sex_ = '1' THEN 'å¥³' END sex, person.brith_date brithdate, person.domicile_place domicileplace, person.mail_add mailadd, person.often_addr oftenaddr, person.post_code postcode, person.email_ email, person.mobile_number mobilenumber, person.phone_ phone, person.unit_name unitname, person.fax_number faxnumber, person.ceimemo ceimemo, person.cust_id custid, person.cust_kind custkind, D1.name_ raw_custkind, person.marital_status maritalstatus, D2.name_ raw_maritalstatus, person.school_ school, D3.name_ raw_school, person.unit_position unitposition, D4.name_ raw_unitposition, person.custtype.cust_type custtype, person.custtype.cust_type_name raw_custtype, person.country_ country, country.name raw_country, person.province_ province, province.name raw_province, person.city_ city, city.name raw_city, person.county_ county ,users1.realname_ creatorname ,users2.realname_ modificatorname from cust_info info left join cust_info_person person on info.id=person.cust_id left join T_DISTRICT country on country.id = person.country_ left join T_DISTRICT province on province.id = person.province_ left join T_DISTRICT city on city.id = person.city_ left join ( select cust_id, wmsys.wm_concat(cti.cust_type) cust_type, wmsys.wm_concat(d17.name_) cust_type_name from cust_type_info cti left join t_dicts_datas d17 on cti.cust_type =d17.id_ group by cust_id ) custtype on (info.id=custtype.cust_id) left join t_users users1 on person.creator_ = users1.id_ left join t_users users2 on person.modificator_ = users2.id_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D1 ON person.cust_kind=D1.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D2 ON person.marital_status=D2.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D3 ON person.school_=D3.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D4 ON person.unit_position=D4.ID_ where info.cust_class = 'CUST_INFO_PERSON' and info.INVALID_=1 /~custname: and info.CUST_NAME like '%{custname}%'~/ /~custnumber: and info.cust_number like '%{custnumber}%'~/ /~idcardno: and person.id_card_no like '%{idcardno}%'~/ /~custkind: and person.cust_kind like '%{custkind}%'~/ /~custtype: and person.custtype.cust_type in ('{custtype}')~/ /~startdate: and person.brith_date >= '{startdate}'~/ /~enddate: and person.brith_date <= '{enddate}'~/
